content cannot be reproduced, copied, or edited in any manner or medium and
is therefore making you posses illegal material. US copyright laws protect
all parts of this material. The owner of this website has been notified of
his actions, and has been told the consequences.

Hence, we demand the immediate removal of (http://www.softmatic.info)
account from your company server and cease the distribution of any of our
products IMMEDIATELY.
We have already notified our corporate lawyers of this situation and we
shall not hesitate to exercise our legal right to pursue this matter in a

Templatemonster.com is committed to investigating licensing infractions not

license. While we support freedom of expression, we must enforce our

feel that your cooperation regarding this matter is fully warranted, and
expect it will be promptly forthcoming.

Thank you and awaiting for your prompt answer.
